alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Genesee; Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 27 at 7:03PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHAUTAUQUA... CATTARAUGUS...SOUTHERN ERIE...WYOMING...GENESEE...AND NORTHERN ERIE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy lake effect snow will continue to focus on the Buffalo Southtowns through mid evening. Snowfall rates of up to 2 inches per hour are expected in this band, reducing visibility down to less than a quarter mile at times and producing snow covered, slippery roads. This band of lake effect snow is expected to remain nearly stationary for a few more hours before moving a little farther south into the Boston Hills by late evening, and then the Southern Tier overnight. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Dunkirk, Fredonia, Hamburg, East Aurora, Evans, Boston, Eden, Springville, Warsaw, Bennington, Colden, Orchard Park, Westfield, Gowanda, Silver Creek, Attica, Angola, North Collins, and Chaffee. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 57 and 60. This includes Route 400 and Route 219. SAFETY INFO...Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
